title: Northern Territory Contact. No. 09
creator_credit: Ian Walker, Malcolm Otton and Film Australia
brief_description: A film on sports and recreation: the Alice Springs Rodeo, the Henley-on-Todd Regatta (held in the dry river bed!), the Camel Cup and the Darwin Beer Can Regatta.
